      • getHttpAuthMechanisms

        public static Set<String> getHttpAuthMechanisms(DrillConfig config)
        Return's list of configured mechanisms for HTTP authentication. For backward compatibility if authentication is enabled it will include FORM mechanism by default.
        Parameters:
        config - - DrillConfig
        Returns:
